2122.subject: RSCH
2122.descrlong: Prepares students to conduct independent research and strengthens their ability to communicate their work.  Students will develop a research proposal, prepare and present research talks, and engage in scholarly peer review.  They will develop advanced professional skills, such as networking and negotiation.  They will also investigate graduate programs, identify potential graduate faculty advisors, and prepare for the Graduate Record Examination. (Offered Spring Semester)  (Credit/No Credit Available)
